testcase.name: Coin Desk API
testcase.system-out: Given User perform GET method for Coin Desk.................................passed Then API response contains "USD" as currency................................passed Then API response contains "GBP" as currency................................passed Then API response contains "EUR" as currency................................passed Then The GBP description equals "British Pound Sterling"....................passed

testcase.name: Place item in the shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Amazon page................................................passed And User search for "book" as search item...................................passed And User selects the item to add cart.......................................passed And User clicks on Add to cart icon.........................................passed Then Verify the cart has been updated and displays the number of items in the cart.passed
